author: Simon Difford
description: Basil adds dry vegetal notes to a Canch√†nchara (honey) Daiquiri.
name: Basil & Honey Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR honey and lime juice in base of shaker until honey dissolves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
